creator: Casino Taxi Limited
descriptionHtml:
Casino Taxi is proud to introduce the fastest, and easiest way to order a Casino Taxi cab in Halifax, Nova Scotia. The free Casino Taxi App is simple, easy to use, and provides real time information on the status of your taxi order. In as few as 3 clicks, you can enter your taxi request and immediately receive a confirmation of booking.

Once a taxi has been assigned, you will receive an instant notification letting you know the roof light number of the cab that will arrive shortly for you. You will also be able to view the location of your assigned taxi on the map (in near real time) as it moves towards your location.

The Casino Taxi App stores a history of your previous taxi requests (up to 30 days) allowing you the convenience of quickly rebooking the same trip with the push of a button. You may also create a list of favorite locations (Home, Work, etc.) to speed the booking process.

Key features and benefits included in the Casino Taxi App are:

• Obtain cost estimates by entering both pick-up and destination addresses
• Create a list of favourite addresses and assign a custom name for each
• Specify the number of passengers, vehicle type, and preferred payment method
• Receive immediate confirmation when a taxi has been assigned to you
• Monitor the progress of your taxi on a map
• Review all reservations you have made over the past 30 days
• Provide feedback related to the application and/or service you received
• Call Casino Taxi with the push of a button

To begin using the Casino Taxi App for the first time simply:

• Download the free app
• Create your account (Email, Name, Phone # and Password)
• Validate your account (via text message confirmation code )

To book a trip:

• Login to the app (Email & Password)
• Enter your pick-up address
• Optional - Enter your destination address (this allows us to provide an estimated fare amount)
• Book your trip (reservations can be immediate or for a future time/date)
descriptionShort: The fastest, and easiest way to order a Casino Taxi cab in Halifax, Nova Scotia.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug fixes and improvements

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We are constantly improving the app. Be sure not to miss these new features in this update:

The fare estimation is now displayed as a range in order to give you more details on how much you will pay for the trip.
To ease reconciliation of payments, the amount of the pre-authorization hold as been added to your booking history and receipts.
For business trips, you can now select your cost centre in the app when your are logged as a business account.
Other small bug fixes and enhancements

descriptionHtml:
Casino Taxi is proud to introduce the fastest, and easiest way to order a Casino Taxi cab in Halifax, Nova Scotia. The free Casino Taxi App is simple, easy to use, and provides real time information on the status of your taxi order. In as few as 3 clicks, you can enter your taxi request and immediately receive a confirmation of booking.

Once a taxi has been assigned, you will receive an instant notification letting you know the roof light number of the cab that will arrive shortly for you. You will also be able to view the location of your assigned taxi on the map (in near real time) as it moves towards your location.

The Casino Taxi App stores a history of your previous taxi requests (up to 30 days) allowing you the convenience of quickly rebooking the same trip with the push of a button. You may also create a list of favorite locations (Home, Work, etc.) to speed the booking process.

Key features and benefits included in the Casino Taxi App are:

• Obtain cost estimates by entering both pick-up and destination addresses
• Create a list of favourite addresses and assign a custom name for each
• Specify the number of passengers, vehicle type, and preferred payment method
• Receive immediate confirmation when a taxi has been assigned to you
• Monitor the progress of your taxi on a map
• Review all reservations you have made over the past 30 days
• Provide feedback related to the application and/or service you received
• Call Casino Taxi with the push of a button

To begin using the Casino Taxi App for the first time simply:

• Download the free app
• Create your account (Email, Name, Phone #)
• Validate your account (via text message confirmation code )

To book a trip:

• Login to the app
• Enter your pick-up address
• Enter your destination address
• Book your trip (reservations can be immediate or for a future time/date)
descriptionShort: The fastest, and easiest way to order a Casino Taxi cab in Halifax, Nova Scotia.

title:
Casino Taxi
8.9.0

creator: Casino Taxi Limited
descriptionHtml:
Casino Taxi is proud to introduce the fastest, and easiest way to order a Casino Taxi cab in Halifax, Nova Scotia. The free Casino Taxi App is simple, easy to use, and provides real time information on the status of your taxi order. In as few as 3 clicks, you can enter your taxi request and immediately receive a confirmation of booking.

Once a taxi has been assigned, you will receive an instant notification letting you know the roof light number of the taxi that will arrive shortly for you. You will also be able to view the location of your assigned taxi on the map (in near real time) as it moves towards your location.

The Casino Taxi App stores a history of your previous taxi requests (up to 30 days) allowing you the convenience of quickly rebooking the same trip with the push of a button. You may also create a list of favorite locations (Home, Work, etc.) to speed the booking process.

Key features and benefits included in the Casino Taxi App are:

• Obtain cost estimates by entering both pick-up and destination addresses
• Create a list of favourite addresses and assign a custom name for each
• Specify the number of passengers, vehicle type, and preferred payment method
• Pay in app with Google Pay or Credit Card
• Receive immediate confirmation when a taxi has been assigned to you
• Monitor the progress of your taxi on a map
• Review all reservations you have made over the past 30 days
• Provide feedback related to the application and/or service you received
• Call Casino Taxi with the push of a button

To begin using the Casino Taxi App for the first time simply:

• Download the free app
• Create your account (Email, Name, Phone #)
• Validate your account (via text message confirmation code )

To book a trip:

• Login to the app
• Enter your pick-up address
• Enter your destination address
• Book your trip (reservations can be immediate or for a future time/date)
